title: Im not sure about you guys...
body: But i'd rather a marksman meta over an early agro jungle meta any day.

replies.body: I just want an Ahri wins all meta
Eww, I'd rather not have champions who do damage without building damage.
Healing Meta come at me, Soraka, Sona and Nami to be able to heal 800 health every 6 seconds, Thats the game i want to play ;)
